divs: sighting detailsi woke up around 5:31. as i walked back to turn my heater up i saw a bright object that seemed to me looked like a star. i rubbed my eyes just to make sure it wasn't me seeing things and it was still there. it kept hovering from side to side with a bright white\yellowish glow which faded in and out as it was doing this motion. i wanted to rule out anything it could of been. i ruled out a helicopter most of them have small green and red lights around the tails and rotors, so there for it would not lite up the whole chopper itself, plane, hmm no there's not a plane that can go side by side and hover that i know of. the area it appeared seemed to be in the next county over or this object was way over the gulf of mexico at a high altitude. this occured over 15mins. i tryed to grab my nightvision scope, but when i got back the object was gone. if you've ever played with adobe photoshop with the lense flare effect. that kinda sums up what it looked like
